articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from day two of the PGA Championship at the Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte, North Carolina.
articles.title: US PGA Championship LIVE: Day 2 leaderboard, tee-times, scores, radio and updates

articles.description: All eyes will be on Bilbao now as Manchester United and Tottenham switch focus from their disappointing domestic campaigns and try to win the Europa League.
articles.title: Europa League final - are Man Utd or Spurs in best shape?

articles.description: Chelsea keep their Champions League hopes in their heads and Aston Villa move into the top five for now following wins on Friday.
articles.title: Champions League qualification: Chelsea keep hopes in hands, Villa need slip-ups

articles.description: Oscar Piastri is quickest in both Friday practice sessions for the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix, ahead of McLaren team-mate Lando Norris.
articles.title: Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix: Oscar Piastri leads Lando Norris in both Friday practice sessions

articles.description: Jannik Sinner sets up a blockbuster Italian Open final against Carlos Alcaraz, after the world number one fought from behind to beat American Tommy Paul.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz set up blockbuster final

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he asked for Tuesday's Premier League game against Bournemouth to be moved, feeling it should "definitely" have been played later in the week.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss unhappy with scheduling of Bournemouth game after FA Cup final

articles.description: Mohamed Salah says Trent Alexander-Arnold did not deserve to be booed by some Liverpool fans after the defender announced he will leave his boyhood club this summer.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Mohamed Salah criticises 'harsh' boos of departing Liverpool player

articles.description: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal will both get extra time to prepare for the Test series against England after being named in a strong India A side.
articles.title: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal in India A squad to tour England

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on DJ and producer Barry Can't Swim with his predictions for the FA Cup final and this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup final & Premier League predictions v Barry Can't Swim

articles.description: Jhonattan Vegas retains his lead on day two of the US PGA Championship, with Max Homa and Matthieu Pavon leading the pursuit at Quail Hollow.
articles.title: US PGA Championship 2025: Jhonattan Vegas leads, Max Homa and Matthieu Pavon make progress as Rory McIlroy starts round
